mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOND_QUOTATION ( QUOTA_TRANS_NO, PRICE_TYPE, PRODUCT_ID, BOND_ACCRU_INT, COMP_BUY_NET_PRICE, COMP_SELL_NET_PRICE, COMP_BUY_FULL_PRICE, COMP_SELL_FULL_PRICE, BUY_INCOME_RATE, SELL_INCOME_RATE, QUOTA_TIME, EXP_TIME ) VALUES ( #{quotaTransNo}, #{priceType}, #{productId}, #{bondAccruInt}, #{compBuyNetPrice}, #{compSellNetPrice}, #{compBuyFullPrice}, #{compSellFullPrice}, #{buyIncomeRate}, #{sellIncomeRate}, #{quotaTime}, #{expTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOND_QUOTATION SET PRICE_TYPE = #{priceType}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}, BOND_ACCRU_INT = #{bondAccruInt}, COMP_BUY_NET_PRICE = #{compBuyNetPrice}, COMP_SELL_NET_PRICE = #{compSellNetPrice}, COMP_BUY_FULL_PRICE = #{compBuyFullPrice}, COMP_SELL_FULL_PRICE = #{compSellFullPrice}, BUY_INCOME_RATE = #{buyIncomeRate}, SELL_INCOME_RATE = #{sellIncomeRate}, QUOTA_TIME = #{quotaTime}, EXP_TIME = #{expTime} WHERE QUOTA_TRANS_NO = #{quotaTransNo}
mapper.select: SELECT QUOTA_TRANS_NO as quotaTransNo, PRICE_TYPE as priceType, PRODUCT_ID as productId, BOND_ACCRU_INT as bondAccruInt, COMP_BUY_NET_PRICE as compBuyNetPrice, COMP_SELL_NET_PRICE as compSellNetPrice, COMP_BUY_FULL_PRICE as compBuyFullPrice, COMP_SELL_FULL_PRICE as compSellFullPrice, BUY_INCOME_RATE as buyIncomeRate, SELL_INCOME_RATE as sellIncomeRate, QUOTA_TIME as quotaTime, EXP_TIME as expTime FROM BOND_QUOTATION WHERE QUOTA_TRANS_NO = #{quotaTransNo}

SELECT QUOTA_TRANS_NO as quotaTransNo, PRICE_TYPE as priceType, PRODUCT_ID as productId, BOND_ACCRU_INT as bondAccruInt, COMP_BUY_NET_PRICE as compBuyNetPrice, COMP_SELL_NET_PRICE as compSellNetPrice, COMP_BUY_FULL_PRICE as compBuyFullPrice, COMP_SELL_FULL_PRICE as compSellFullPrice, BUY_INCOME_RATE as buyIncomeRate, SELL_INCOME_RATE as sellIncomeRate, QUOTA_TIME as quotaTime, EXP_TIME as expTime FROM BOND_QUOTATION WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT QUOTA_TRANS_NO as quotaTransNo, PRICE_TYPE as priceType, PRODUCT_ID as productId, BOND_ACCRU_INT as bondAccruInt, COMP_BUY_NET_PRICE as compBuyNetPrice, COMP_SELL_NET_PRICE as compSellNetPrice, COMP_BUY_FULL_PRICE as compBuyFullPrice, COMP_SELL_FULL_PRICE as compSellFullPrice, BUY_INCOME_RATE as buyIncomeRate, SELL_INCOME_RATE as sellIncomeRate, QUOTA_TIME as quotaTime, EXP_TIME as expTime FROM BOND_QUOTATION
SELECT * FROM BOND_QUOTATION WHERE QUOTA_TIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND EXP_TIME > NOW() ORDER BY QUOTA_TIME DESC
